attributes.action: Permit tax relief on householder mortgage repayments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the tax payers have 'lent' billions of pounds to the banks, who have created this mess through their own greed.
Nevertheless they are now entitled to claim tax relief on the interest payments for those loans.
The government could easily unclog the housing market and stimulate the economy by allowing the same tax relief on mortgage interest repayments.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Depositrelief/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MIRAS-Revival/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
